mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.object_name AS "objectName", a.object_id AS "objectId", a.original_num AS "originalNum", a.scheduling_num AS "schedulingNum", a.complete_num AS "completeNum", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy", a.update_time AS "updateDate"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_scheduling_plan( id, object_name, object_id, original_num, scheduling_num, complete_num, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{objectName}, #{objectId}, #{originalNum}, #{schedulingNum}, #{completeNum}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_scheduling_plan SET object_name = #{objectName}, object_id = #{objectId}, original_num = #{originalNum}, scheduling_num = #{schedulingNum}, complete_num = #{completeNum}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
